articles.author: Kevin Purdy
articles.title: Metal Slug Tactics is an odd mix of arcade shooter and grid strategy that works - Ars Technica
articles.description: Fusing the look and feel of the classic 2D shooter series to the painstaking planning of an isometric tactics game? Yeah, okay, it somehow plays.

articles.title: Apple Reportedly Weighing Smart Glasses Push - PYMNTS.com
articles.description: Apple is reportedly exploring the viability of entering the smart glasses market. The tech giant has launched an in-house study of currently available
articles.content:
Apple is reportedly exploring the viability of entering the smart glasses market.
